user.speaker: user
user.text: What is it called outside of the USA?

agent.speaker: agent
agent.text: In the United States, it is known as soccer. Some other countries also call it soccer, but in most parts of the world, it is called football. Sports commonly called football in certain places include association football ( known as soccer in some countries ) ; gridiron football ( specifically American football or Canadian football ) ; Australian rules football ; rugby football ( either rugby league or rugby union ) ; and Gaelic football .

contexts.text:
Southern United States
In recent decades association football , known in the South as in the rest of the United States as `` soccer '' , has become a popular sport at youth and collegiate levels throughout the region . The game has been historically widespread at the college level in the Atlantic coast states of Maryland , Virginia , and the Carolinas , which contain many of the nation 's most successful college soccer programs .
contexts.title: Southern United States

ml.tokens.model_text: Southern United States In recent decades association football , known in the South as in the rest of the United States as `` soccer ''

contexts.text:
Football
Football is a family of team sports that involve , to varying degrees , kicking a ball to score a goal . Unqualified , the word football is understood to refer to whichever form of football is the most popular in the regional context in which the word appears . Sports commonly called football in certain places include association football ( known as soccer in some countries ) ; gridiron football ( specifically American football or Canadian football ) ; Australian rules football ; rugby football ( either rugby league or rugby union ) ; and Gaelic football . These different variations of football are known as football codes .
contexts.title: Football

agent.original_text: I don't have specific information about what the MLS All-Star Game is called outside of the USA. However, it's commonly referred to as the "MLS All-Star Game" in international soccer circles.

llm_based_tags.reasoning: The pronoun 'it' has no referent in the query. The question assumes knowledge of what specific thing is being asked about, making it impossible to answer without prior conversation context.
